Web DevIllustrationGames
January 2014

1BB Murder House

Global Game Jam

4 people are trapped in a house. One of them is a murderer. A local multiplayer game requiring 4 players. I was the artist and animator.

February 2013

Ant Warz

Gallery

A mobile RTS on the Android platform. I created all the promotional art, game assets, and animations in Adobe Illustrator. No longer available on Google Play.

June 2012

Broadsides

GalleryDeveloper blog

A 10-week student project from 2012. Broadsides is a multiplayer broadside combat arena game, with LAN multiplayer support for up to 8 players.
